mapper.select: select o.id, o.name, o.birthday, o.initday, o.rank, d.name as departmentName, o.location, o.office_number, o.phone_number from scourt_db.officer as o, scourt_db.department as d where o.department = d.id

select o.id, o.name, o.birthday, o.initday, o.rank, d.name as departmentName, o.location, o.office_number, o.phone_number from scourt_db.officer as o, scourt_db.department as d where o.department = d.id
and o.name like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
and o.rank like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
and departmentName like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
and o.office_number like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
limit #{firstList}, #{listSize};

select count(*) from scourt_db.officer as o, scourt_db.department as d where o.department = d.id
and o.name like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
and o.rank like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
and departmentName like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
and o.office_number like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
